summary: A mod that adds a tattoo for ADEC body
descriptionHtml:
[color= gray][b]Description:[/b][/color]
[list]
[*]Replaces the female body tattoo from RaceMenu Overlays with one for ADEC body
[/list]

[color= gray][b]Notes:[/b][/color]
[list]
[*]you will need the ADEC body mod (but i think this will work with any body but the alignment will be a little of)
[/list]

[color= gray][b]Requirements:[/b][/color]
[list]
[*]ADEC body [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/5390/?] here [/url]
[*]RaceMenu [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?] here [/url] and the optional file called Overlays Plugin
[/list]

[color= gray][b]Updates:[/b][/color]
[list]
[*]v1.0 - initial release
[/list]

[color= gray][b]Glitches[/b][/color]
[list]
[*]none. at least for me
[/list]

[color= gray][b]Installation[/b][/color]
[list]
[color= gray][b]NMM[/b][/color]
[*]download, activate and when prompted overwrite
[color= gray][b]Manual[/b][/color]
[*]extract files to Data directory and overwrite
[/list]

[color= gray][b]Credits:[/b][/color]

EyeCandy Body ADEC by Acdale[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5390&navtag=file/images.php?id=5390&tab=3] here [/url]

Body Paint Mod by Wast1980 (from witch i created this version)[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=24867&navtag=file/images.php?id=24867&tab=3] here [/url]

RaceMenu by expired6978 [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?] here [/url]
author: foooterman
